short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your team communication with nested comment threads in Jira.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, users can reply directly to specific comments, creating clear and organized discussion threads that maintain context and improve collaboration. Whether you're managing a complex project or a simple task, this extension ensures that all comments are logically grouped, making it easier to follow discussions, resolve issues, and keep your team on the same page.

Simplify communication and stay organized with the Jira Threaded Comments Extension.
